choices: Paige, obviously, since she's the main protagonist
Perhaps one of the other Daniels family members
Or one of Paige's friends at school
Maybe one of the teachers at Brookside
Of course, there are the other characters to fatten up
1.content: Welcome to the story! Here is where you choose which character you want to fatten up! What will you choose?
1.title: Character Choice

choices: Paige tries out the cafeteria breakfast with Dani
Paige meets Jackie and Maya in the hallway
Paige decides to get McDonalds with Dani and ditch class
Paige goes to first period, math with Mrs. Rush
Skip to lunch, where Dani stuffs her face
11.content:
"Paige get up or you're going to be late for the first day of school!" Her mother, Elizabeth yelled from downstairs. Paige tiredly got out of the bed and picked out her clothes for the day. Letting out a yawn, Paige settled on a Brookside lacrosse tank top and a pair of Nike short shorts. As Paige walked downstairs, she was greeted by her dog Bailey, panting and wagging his tail. "Finally, you're downstairs for breakfast." Elizabeth said, clad in a workout outfit.

"Yea, so what did you make?" Paige asked, taking a sip of orange juice.

"Just some egg whites." Liz replied as she started to eat some for herself. After Paige finished breakfast, she gathered her backpack and phone and started to drive to school in her ice white BMW.

As Paige arrived at school, she spotted her best friend Danielle Harris in the parking lot. "Dani! It's so good to see you!" Paige said, hugging her plump friend. As long as Paige could remember, Dani was always chubby.

"Hey Paige! What did you do this summer?" Dani asked, eating a McDonalds hash brown for breakfast.

"I mostly partied a lot, went to the beach and worked out. What about you?"

"I was a counselor at Elk Mountain Day Camp. The food there was so good I think I put on like ten pounds this summer." Dani said, grabbing her flab.

"Oh that's not good. So what are you now 170?"

"Yea, I'm thinking about a diet but my mom said that she doesn't care about my weight."

"I wish my mom was as lenient about weight as yours. My mom would freak out if I was 125, and if I was 170, forget about it. I would be grounded the rest of the year." Paige said as her and Dani started to laugh. "Come on . Let's go inside. Jackie and Maya are waiting." Paige said as her overweight friend waddled next to her.
11.title: First Morning of Senior Year

choices: Gym with the chubby gym teacher Mrs. Hill
PreCalc with the lazy and morbidly obese Mrs. Rush
Study Hall, where Dani brings snacks and leftover breakfast
111.content:
"Paige you have to try this sausage, it's absolutely delicious!" Dani said as she took another bite of her maple sausage.

Paige felt absolutely bloated. Because she avoided her mothers's organic breakfast, she felt ravenous by the time she reached the cafeteria with Dani. Paige eaten six waffle sticks, a side off eggs, and four links of sausage. "I would love too Dani, but I feel stuffed." Paige replied, letting out a tiny belch.

"That's too bad. I'll have your leftovers. I'm still hungry." Dani said, grabbing Paige's lunch tray as Paige got up.

"Okay, I'm going to head to first period, see ya at lunch." Paige said, as she started to walk into the hallway. Paige saw her friends Jackie and Maya walking together. "Hey Jackie, Maya. What do you gals have first period?"

"Hey Paige!" The two said simultaneously. "We both have Science with Mrs. Adams." "What a coincidence, so do I." Paige answered as the three girls cheered and made their way down to the class.

The girls noticed that besides them three, they also had their friends Leigh Baron and Jennifer Kane from lacrosse, and Danielle's boyfriend Kyle. All six of them sat in the back of the class and gossiped throughout the entire period. They also noticed that the fattest person in their grade, Becky Henderson, was in their class. She was a whopping 290 pounds, and one of the biggest geeks in school. She was clad in a Star Wars shirt and sweats. Paige giggled as she nearly got stuck in her seat at the end of class. After first period is...
111.title: A Sort Of Balanced Breakfast

choices: Mrs. Hill finds out and punishes Paige
Mrs.Hill doesn't find out and Paige continues
They put more food in the teachers lounge
1111.content:
Having gym first period didn't exactly suit Paige's interests. She wasn't in the mood to exercise at 7:30 in the morning. Luckily for her, she had Jackie in her class. Since it was the first day, the teacher Mrs. Hill, spent the whole day just setting up the attendance spots and going over the rules. The students were shocked when Mrs. Hill waddled into the as formerly the thin, sexy volleyball coach, but succumbed to the pressures of a slower appetite and a tighter scheduler, filled with quick fast food pickups for lunch and dinner. She waddled into the gym at around 200 pounds. Most of the weight was centered around her sizable stomach, but the rest evened out to her chest and butt.

The class was laid back for the most part, as Paige spent the majority of the period talking to Jackie and her other friend Tina, but what surprised her was when Mrs. Hill called her over at the end of the period. "What do you need Mrs. Hill?" Paige asked as Mrs. Hill looked at Paige with jealousy. Paige had the figure that Mrs. Hill epitomized. A slender stomach accompanied with a huge rack, and a juicy ass with cheeks the size and firm, spherical shape of volleyballs. Mrs. Hill had thought of the perfect way to damage Paige's figure. "Well Paige, as you can probably tell, I'm not as active as I used to be." Mrs. Hill began while letting out a belch. "Yea so?" "Well, I was thinking I could use an assistant. I asked the principal and she's perfectly fine with me volunteering one student to be my assistant. Would you be interested? You were always one of the more active students around here." "Sure that sounds fun." Paige responded. "Alright great!" Mrs. Hill devilishly smiled. "Do you mind getting my lunch from the teachers lounge? And make sure to take no food from there." Mrs. Hill sternly asked. "Yea sure, no problem." Paige responded as she walked with Jackie to retrieve her backpack.

"What was that all about?" Jackie pondered as she walked with Paige. "Oh, Mrs. Hill just asked me to be her assistant or something. I'm sure its like extra credit." Paige responded. "Oh thats cool." Jackie answered as she waved goodbye to Paige while walking into her next class. Paige walked by herself into the lounge and grabbed the lunch bag. Suddenly, her stomach rumbled louder than an earthquake. "I'm sure Mrs. Hill won't mind if I take a little snack." Paige said ripping open a bag of barbecue chips from the bag.
1111.title: An Unexpected Offer

choices: They add a free lunch for each teacher in the lounge and Paige indulges
Mrs.Hill finds out
11112.content:
A few weeks later:
"Paige is looking a little heavier than usual." Jackie thought to herself as Paige walked over to her. With each step, Paige seemed to have more of a jiggle to her step. Her curvier legs were shoved into tight leggings, while her chubbier stomach was pouring out of an ill-fitting Pink brand blouse. "Hey Jackie!" Paige said as she tossed away her breakfast tray of waffle sticks. She'd started a habit of eating breakfast in mornings with Danielle. "Oh hey Paige." Jackie said she kept scanning Paige's chubbier body. Paige's face was chubbier too, she was starting to have the beginnings of a double chin and her cheeks were rounder as well. Paige seemed oblivious to the fact that she'd gained 10 pounds just from being Mrs. Hill's assistant, and the effects were showing on her body,

After playing soccer in gym, Paige did the usual after class meeting with Mrs. Hill to retrieve her food and steal one or two snacks. "I hope she packed those double stuffed oreos again!" Paige said as she walked into the lounge. Her small pot belly bounced and her legs jiggled with each step. Paige's stomach growled as she quickly grabbed the bag and searched through the bag for snacks. She settled on a bag of cheez-its to eat. Paige quickly devoured the bag, showcasing a much more slobbish way of eating. She stuffed handfuls in her mouth and quick chewed with her mouth open. "Those were delicious!" Paige said as she headed back to the gym.
11112.title: The Habit Continues

choices: Paige is up to 170 now
Another teacher sees what Paige is up to
111121.content:
As Paige walked into the lounge one day, she saw a huge buffet set up for all of the teachers. Every delicious pastry and food she could possibly fantasize eating were set up on the table. Brownies, cookies, cupcakes, cheese and crackers, all set up for Paige to eat. The room was empty, as most teachers were teaching the first two periods. "I guess I can treat myself." Paige lauged to herself as she grabbed a brownie.

Paige's face turned red as she let out one last loud belch. She'd eaten at least half of the buffet. Her blouse was covered in chocolate sauce. Stealthily sneaking out to her class, Paige's flabby face was flooded red with embarrassment. She didn't expect to stuff her face with half of a buffet set up for most of the teaching staff. "I'm sure they could just blame it on the fat janitor." Paige thought to herself as she arrived late to her next class.

"Late again Paige?" Her math teacher Mrs. Rush asked. She would surely be a teacher disappointed by the disappearance of the buffet food, since she was over 300 pounds. "Sorry Mrs. Rush." Paige wheezed as she walked to her seat. Many students were intrigued by Paige's weight gain. She was formerly the untouchable queen bee of the school, with a perfect body, but now she was starting to become chubby and out of shape. Her appetite was majorly on the rise too. She was eating double as much as she used too. "How am I still starving?" Paige asked herself during class as she heard her chubby stomach rumble.
111121.title: A Feast Fit for A Paige

choices: Paige's friends weights are being affected by hanging out with her
Paige continues to gsin snd becoming more sloppy
Jackie's point of view of the situation
1111211.content:
As Paige weighed herself one morning, she seemed very displeased with the number on the scale:

172

The number frightened her. She'd never been over 150 pounds before, let along 170! She was being transformed by Mrs. Hill into a fat pig! Her face now featured a permanent double chin and chubby squirrel cheeks, which contained a greasy exterior of skin from the constant stuffing of her face with junk foods. Traveling down her body, her breasts have increased in size by a cup size due to the the excess flab. Unfortunately, her former slender arms with a hunt of muscle from lacrosse workouts were now coated in flab, jiggling non stop as she rubbed them along her portly stomach. Her six pack abs were now divided into rolls of excess flab, as three rolls of flab settled themselves onto Paige's midsection. Her hips and thighs were wider, as Paige's thigh gap was now nonexistent. Her thighs chaffed with each step she took. Speaking of steps, her legs were much thicker than they used to be, encrusted in a layer of fat. Her calves shook and her much bigger behind jiggled.

Paige couldn't deny that she'd gained weight anymore. Her clothes had all but outgrown her, so she settled on wearing elastic clothes more often, such as sweats, leggings, sweatsuits, sweatshirts and cardigans, along with the rare spandex shorts that showcased her leg fat. This day, Paige settled on wearing Brookside lacrosse sweats along with a Nike blouse. Paige waddled down the steps and grabbed her backpack to go to school.

Sliding her flabby body into her compact ice white BMW, Paige started the drive to school. While driving, a certain McDonalds billboard caught Paige's eye, and she couldn't resist, quickly pulling into the drive thru and ordering a big breakfast. Parking in a distant spot, Paige started to stuff her face with the meal. Syrup dripped down her firm double chin and onto her shirt, while Paige sloppily kept grabbing handfuls of scrambled eggs and pancakes. It was official, Paige had descended into a state of slovenliness. "That was good." Paige said to herself as she let out a loud belch from the filling breakfast.

Paige arrived at school around 7:15 and waddled to the girls locker room, where she met up with Jackie. Jackie, in recent days, was disgusted and sometimes embarrassed by hanging out with Paige. "I could see Paige already engorged herself.'' Jackie said, noting the syrup stains in Paige's blouse and the scent of hotcakes and syrup. "Jackie want to hang out after school? Maya and Dani already said yes. "Sure, sounds fun." Jackie replied as Paige waddled into the gym. Mrs. Hill laughed too herself as she saw her plumped up assistant waddle into the gym. Clad tightly in her outfit, Paige looked more out of shape and sloppy than ever.

The class went pretty quickly, even though Paige felt gassed after the period due to her flab causing much lower stamina "Anything you need Mrs. Hill?" Paige asked her teacher after class. "Just the usual sweetie." Mrs. Hill said. Little did she know, her lunches were getting smaller and smaller each day
1111211.title: 172 Pounds of Plump and Piggish Paige

choices: The meeting goes well
The meeting goes bad
11112112.content: After pigging out yet again on the teachers lounge sweets Paige was late to Mrs.Rush’s class again. “Paige Daniels, your late again so your gonna have to meet me after class”. Paige knee it was coming as she threatened her the last time it happened. She had just gotten hungrier and eating the sweets in the teachers lounge and eating some of Mrs.Hill’s lunch gave her a rush of adrenaline. She had just gotten bigger throughout the school year so moving fast wasn’t as easy as it used to be.
11112112.title: Paige continues to gain and become more sloppy

choices: A lot of the staff becomes more friendly
Months later
111121121.content: After the bell rings Paige stays after class. Mrs.Rush waddles over to Paige and says, “ I had a talk to your first period teacher Mrs.Hill and she said the reason you are late is because she has you helping her out and doing errands for her is that correct?”. Surprised Paige answers, “uh yes that’s why I’m late.” “We’ll why didn’t you say so honey! I could’ve just cut you some slack if you had told me. Anyways here, if anyone stops you in the hallway just show them this.” She said as she slid Paige a laminated piece of paper that said student pass. “I also saw you were eating during class which I usually don’t allow but you must be tired from doing all of Mrs.Hill’s errands all morning. So here eat this, you must be exhausted” she said as she handed Paige a bag of chips and two candy bars. “Those teachers usually eat all of the food in the teachers lounge before I can get to it but I usually stock up on items from the vending machine. If your every hungry don’t be afraid to ask, I wouldn’t mind sharing with a kind hardworking student like you.” Paige accepted the food and had a naughty feeling deep down because she knew she was the one eating a lot of the food in the teachers lounge. She said thank you and went to her next class.
111121121.title: The meeting goes well

choices: Months pass
More and more teachers contribute to spoiling Paige
1111211211.content: Paige, Maya, and Dani all went in the lunch line to get food. They got their usual cafeteria food, a burger, fries, Mac n cheese, bags of chips, etc. When Paige went to pay the lunch lady said, "oh your Paige Daniels? Here take another bag of chips and side of fries, on the house." She winked as she handed it to her. Paige reluctantly took it and went to sit down. "Why does the staff love Paige so much?" Maya said playfully. "Yeah Paige give me some tips, they always give you special privileges" Dani said. "Guys I don't know I think Mrs.Hill likes to brag about me to the other teachers." Paige responded. "Yeah probably, she loves to make you do things for her while she eats food during class." Dani said.
1111211211.title: A lot of the staff becomes more friendly

choices: Erin
Rachel
Hannah
112.content:
Paige and Dani made their way through the hallways proudly. This was their year. At long last, they were the top dogs of the school. They waved hello to their acquaintances as they passed, then finally found Maya and Jackie perched outside the art hallway.

"And then I said, that's the biggest-oh, hi, girls!" Jackie greeted her two approaching friends and embraced them one at a time, taking turns with her raven-haired counterpart. Both were looking as stunning as ever.

"How've you two been?" Dani asked after their hugs concluded.

"Y'know, getting loads of-"

"Jackie!" Maya cut the blonde off.

"Lots of BOYS!" She clarified.

Paige giggled. "Business as usual, it sounds like."

"Spot on there." Maya laughed.

"So you guys heard about the new girl?" Jackie asked her comrades.

"No. What grade?" Paige asked.

"Senior." Maya said.

Paige considered the news. It was always exciting to have a new girl on the grounds, and being a new arrival in the twilight of one's high school career can be especially hard. She was certain that she would at the very least cake contact, and more than likely befriend the latest addition to the graduating class.

"Speak of the devil. Here she is." Maya announced as the new girl came in the doors at the terminus of the hallway.

She was...

1. Erin, dark blonde long hair, 5'6", around 145 pounds. Thick, almost chubby. Very into academics, tennis, and supehero comics. Her personality could be described as bubbly, loud, and outspoken. She's pretty personable, and doesn't have any trouble making friends. While she is very much invested in tennis, the stress of being an academic perfectionist leads to its fair share of stress eating.

2. Rachel, black short hair, 5'9", slim at 120 pounds. She was easily one of the smartest at her old school, and has a great love for music, as an accomplished member of the orchestra. She's rather nice, but at the same time, witty and sarcastic, often using sarcasm as a line of defense. But given how much senior year matters in one's life, is Rachel strong enough to resist the allure of fatty comfort food to ease her anxiety?

3. Hannah,brown medium length hair, 5'10", slim but curvy in thee right places at 128 pounds. Smart, but doesn't take school quite as seriously as some of her peers. Very casual and laid back, but also very skilled in the sport of volleyball. She's recovered from an ACL tear last year, recommending her for a less than forward position on any team. Will her lessened participation be enough to keep the pounds off.
112.title: The New Girl

choices: The girls get a full show of Mrs. Rush's laziness and slob behavior during class
Dani goes to the snack bar and asks her obese mother for snacks
Fast forward to lunch, where Jackie, Maya and Dani attempt to start the plan
1123.content:
The new girl casually strolled down the corridor, and she had a figure than would make most girls jealous. She was tall, had luscious brunette hair, bouncy double dcups, and an ass that would put most seniors to shame. While Paige was pretty solid in the looks department, even she was a little jealous. "Excuse me, can one of you show me where Mrs. Rush's pre calc classroom is?" The girl asked shyly.

"Oh sure, I have Mrs. Rush next period. We can walk together." Paige said as she waved goodbye to her friends.

"Look at that Jackie. She has an ass that makes yours look like Carmen Price's." Maya laughed.

"Stop it." Jackie said, clearly jealous at the new girls beauty.

"She sure is something." Dani replied.

"We have to do something, or else that girl is going to steal all the attention of the guys away from us." Jackie said furiously.

"Well what can we do?" Maya asked. Her and Jackie tried to think of something, before Dani though of an idea.

"Girls, I've got it! We can fatten her up!" Dani proudly stated.

"Fatten her up?" Jackie asked, sounding confused.

"Yea, we can befriend her, invite her to our lunch table, and give her our food when we're full. We could also give her snacks. My mom is one of the main PTA volunteers who works at the snack cafe. I can get a bunch of food."

"I'm loving this idea." Jackie smirked.

"But isn't that mean?" Maya asked. "She is the new girl after all."

"Relax Maya. Just trust Dani on this." Jackie said, as the three girls went off to their separate classes.

Meanwhile in the next hallway over:

"So you're the new girl right?" Paige asked the new girl.

"Yea, I'm new. Before here I lived in Florida. What's your name by the way? You seem really nice." Hannah replied.

"I'm Paige Daniels, and you are?"

"Hannah, Hannah Cohen." Hannah answered. "So do you do any sports besides lacrosse, as I can obviously tell by your tank top."

"I"m also a cheerleader. Do you play any sports?"

"Yea, I was a star volleyball player at my old high school. I'm thinking about playing in college too, since I'm getting scholarship offers from a lot of colleges."

"Oh that's cool. Why did you move?"

"My mom got promoted to a better job near the city so we moved here."

"Nice. My dad owns a steak restaurant. His fillet is the best."

"I can only imagine." Hannah said as both girls shared a laugh.

"Well, here's Mrs. Rush's room. Want to sit next to each other?" Paige asked.

"Sure." Hannah replied, as they walked in.
1123.title: Hannah Cohen; The Star Volleyball Player

choices: Physical education
Study Hall
11233.content:
Hannah and Paige exited the lunch line with their trays in hand and made their way to the table where their trio of friends resided, along with a veritable mountain of food. Loads of chips, muffins, cookies, soda, and popcorn awaited them.

Hannah took her seat across from the three, next to Paige. "Uhh, what's up with the snacks, guys?" She chuckled.

Maya grinned in a friendly fashion. "Just a welcome party for you! You gotta be hungry!"

"I appreciate it, but I really shouldn't eat that stuff. I gotta keep in shape for volleyball."

"Oh, you'll be fine! You can work it off in gym easy!" Jackie insisted.

Dani nodded in agreement. "You'll be fine!"

"Don't worry, Hannah, I'll share with you if you don't wanna eat it all." Paige volunteered.

Hannah shrugged and nodded. "Alright, I'll buy it." She reached for a bag of popcorn, tears it open, and starts delivering handfuls to her mouth. Her eyes were instantly alight with joy. All summer and junior year she had denied herself these delicacies due to her lack of physical activity, but now, she could play her favorite sport once again, so what she ate obviously didn't matter so long as she got on the team. She quickly finished the bag of salty popcorn and stuffed the muffins in her mouth quickly in succession. Once half of the pile was gone, she felt an unusual tightness on her already snug black Nike hoodie and decided to stop, else she incur forty five minutes of pain in the subsequent class.

Jackie, Maya, and Dani grinned in satisfaction. Soon, Hannah Cohen would be but an echo of what she once was, and the rightful queens of Brookside would be back on top.

As Hannah retracted herself from the pile, it was Paige's cue to finish it. She was careful not to take too much joy in her feast, else she become addicted and catch the ire of her fitness obsessed mother.

The bell rang, and Hannah and Paige ventured off to their next class together, which was...
11233.title: Fattening Phase One

choices: A fit 110 pound woman, currently exercising
A slightly chubby 160 pound woman, currently watching TV
An obese 300 pound woman, currently stuffing her face with dinner
112331.content:
As Paige and Hannah walked into the gymnasium clad in their gym uniform of a Brookside T-shirt and athletic shorts, they spotted Mrs. Hill, the phys ed teacher who was formerly in the top shape of her life, but put on quite a few pounds after getting married. She was now around 180 pounds, and the new weight drastically affected her will to workout. Instead of running along side the students on the track, she opted for the easier option to either bring out a lawn chair and snack through the period, or follow her students on a golf cart as they ran.

"Cohen, Daniels! You two are next to each other over here." Mrs. Hill, yelled, with her voice sounding like she was snacking on something, Hannah and Paige walked over to their seats. Close to them was Paige's friend Leigh Baron and her other friend Kasey Evans. While Paige knew Leigh for a long time since they've played lacrosse together since fourth grade, Paige met Kasey in math last year and they've talked since. Kasey was thin, but Leigh was a little chubby, weighing 145.

"Hey Paige who's the new girl?" Leigh asked.

"Oh, this is Hannah. She's really nice and she plays on the volleyball team." Paige answered.

"Volleyball? We should introduce her to Tara and Jaime."

"Oh yea, they're on the volleyball team and really nice." Paige replied.

"I'll be sure to look out for them in practice today!" Hannah replied, as Mrs. Hill ordered the kids to start running while eating a snack cake.

After school and an easy practice where she befriended Tara and Jaime, Hannah returned home to see her mother,
112331.title: Meeting Husky Mrs. Hill

choices: The Mall
Paige's house
1123313.content:
Hannah walked in the door to her for-the-most-part new house and dropped her bag by the stairs for when she would head up.

"Mom, I'm home!" The new Brookside student announced as she arrived and walked towards the kitchen, where she found her mother in her natural habitat: chowing down. When she met the man that was Hannah's father, he not only knocked her up, but he constantly treated her to great amounts of food in an effort to plump her up into his idea of perfection. His plan worked, but the two separated two months before Hannah's birth due to him moving to China for his work, and they never had contact again. However, Diana Cohen (she changed her last name for simplicity's sake in raising Hannah) did not lose a single pound added to her body. In fact, her size only amplified due to her food addiction and office job.

Being an only child of an obese parent, it was rather difficult for Hannah to maintain her lithe figure, but she achieved the great feat nonetheless.

"Oh, hi, baby! How was your first day?" Diana asked her daughter with a big smile on her face, taking a brief break from her Fillet-O-Fish sandwich.

"Good. Met a lot of nice girls, Paige, Dani, Jackie, Maya, Tara, and Jaime." She sat down at the table, across from her blob of a mother. She never minded her mom's unhealthy tendencies, she simply wasn't as drawn to them as Diane was.

"Well aren't you little miss popular! Come on, have something to eat!" She encouraged Hannah to dive into the various bags of McDonald's that sat upon the tabletop.

Hannah smiled and nodded, then started making miniature sandwiches with fries and McNuggets. The feast she had earlier in the day had unlocked her inner hungriness, so she ate like she was royalty.

After finishing her dinner and going upstairs, Hannah enjoyed a hot shower, noticing the slight curve on her midsection, but writing it off as bloating. She got out, dried off, and put on her pajamas of flannel pants and a tank top. She grabbed her phone and lied down in bed with no intent of going to sleep.

Hannah began to text Paige with a request to hang out after school tomorrow, she accepted, asking where she wished to go.
1123313.title: Stark Contrast

choices: "Did you gain weight recently? You're looking a little chubby."
"You have any snacks left? I'm starved."
"How was school today?"
11233132.content:
After a long day of school, Paige and Hannah drove in Paige's Bimmer back to her house. It was in a development called Brookside Acres, full of fancy and big houses. Dani was three houses away, so Paige invited her to come over too, and she accepted.

"So this is your house?" Hannah said as Paige pulled into the driveway.

"Yep, La Casa de Daniels." Paige replied as they shared a laugh. "Also I told Dani that she could come over so she'll be here in a few.

"Oh cool. She seems nice." Hannah happily answered.

After opening the door, Paige spotted her mother in the living room performing an afternoon workout.

"Hi mom. My friend Hannah's here, she's new in school this year." Paige said as her mother paused the Jillian Michaels workout tape.

"Nice to meet you Hannah." Elizabeth said, wheezing from being exhausted from the hard exercise.

"You too Mrs. Daniels." Hannah replied.

"Why are you working out? You usually don't exercise in the afternoon." Paige asked,

"Well after a lunch date with Dani's mom, if you don't work out, you'll gain at least a pound." Liz answered, recalling her lunch at the Brookside Cafe with Karen Harris, as her an Paige laughed.

"Also Dani's coming in a few. We'll be in my room if you need us." Paige said as her and Hannah went up to Paige's room.

10 minutes later, Dani arrived with a handful of snacks. A box of donuts, two bags of Cool Ranch Doritos, and a bag of Cheez-It's, which she knew were Paige's favorite snack. "Hey gals. You don't mind if I brought some snacks do you?" Dani smiled. While Hannah had no reaction, Paige immediately heard her stomach rumble. Her mouth started to water while staring at the Cheez-It's box.

While Dani's original plan of fattening up Hannah seemed to be in full throttle and working well, she was unknowingly also fattening up her best friend. Paige simply stuffed her face with snacks the whole hang out. Around 4pm, her mother stormed upstairs to ask her something.
11233132.title: Binge Snacking at the Daniels House

choices: Dani tries to get the coach to give her a smaller position
Dani brings even more food to lunch so Hannah won't perform as well.
112331322.content:
Paige's mother came and picked up the leftover Cheez-Its and scurried away, stuffing handfuls of the crackers in her mouth.

Hannah chuckled once she was out of earshot. "What's her deal?"

"Stress. She gets the munchies when she's under pressure." Paige explained to her new friend.

"Oh, I see. My mom just eats what she wants."

"Mine, too!" Dani laughs. "She's huge!"

Hannah shoved another doughnut in her mouth. "No way she's bigger than mine."

"If your mom's so big, how come you aren't?"

"Volleyball." Hannah answered simply, quickly following up the doughnut with another one.

"Tryouts start tomorrow." Paige said amid a mouthful of Doritos

Hannah beamed with excitement, then put away an additional baked treat. "I'm gonna do hella good!"

Dani was somewhat worried. Hannah getting on the team in a top pick would derail the plan to plump her up completely. She had to think of a solution to her problem, and fast.

.
112331322.title: An Afternoon Snacking

choices: Hannah binge eats the rest of the night to try and make the pain go away
Increased eating + Less Working Out in Practice = Weight Gain
Dani and Paige notice Hannah eating more at lunch the next day
1123313221.content:
Convincing Mrs. Hill, the coach of the volleyball team, to give Hannah a smaller position on the team was quite easy. All Danielle had to do was bribe Coach with some food and she was easy to control as a well trained dog.

After practice, Hannah was talking to Jaime and Tara, however Coach Hill pulled her aside. "Look, Cohen. I've seen your skills in volleyball, and you look really good. Unfortunately, I saw your physical and it said you were injured for all of last season. While I'd love to have you play, it's a school rule that injured players are supposed to be back slowly, so starting to,or row, we're going to give you easier practices, less playing time, until we feel you're 100% recovered."

Hannah was so distraught, all she could answer with was, "Ok coach.", and she stormed off into her Toyota sedan to drive home. While driving home, she suddenly started to get hunger pains in her stomach. Even though Dani, Jackie and Maya fed her a pretty big lunch, she felt ravenous. Perhaps it was from the stress of her discussion with Coach Hill, or maybe it was because she didn't have dinner, either way she felt starving, and pulled over to a Taco Bell. Walking inside, she ordered two Doritos locos tacos and a side of nachos. Belching as she finished her meal, she drove back home to find her mother snacking on the couch. "Hey Hannah, you want some chips?" Hannah smiled as she walked over to the couch to share some chips with her mother.
1123313221.title: Hannah's Injury Hinders Her Chance to Shine

choices: Dani starts to feel bad and offers to hang out with her
Paige tries to introduce her to a new hobby
11233132212.content:
A couple of weeks had gone by, and Hannah's participation in volleyball was doing little to keep her in shape. She came into school on a Friday, dressed in a pair of colorful pink and blue camo print leggings, a blue Brookside spirit wear t-shirt, and a black voleyball hoodie left open on the front, with her last name and the number four on her back. Her legs had thickened considerably, her thighs rubbing together slightly. A decent bit of softness had accrued around her middle, making it so the indent of her belly button was visible through her t-shirt. The constricting waistband of her leggings cut into her softness quite a bit, giving her belly a slight overhang, and the illusion of love handles, even though she wasn't at that point yet. Her breasts had gone up half a cup size, pulling the neckline of any shirt she would wear down about three quarters of an inch more than it used to, A tiny bit of fullness had developed around her neck and cheeks, but not enough to be noticeable unless she tilted her head down, which gave her a bona-fide double chin.

Hannah was fat. And she knew it.

Her mother didn't say a word, afraid of hurting her little girl's feelings. She had grown used to coddling her over the years, which meant in this case, supplying her with as much food as she wanted.

Despite her awareness of her growing stature, Hannah couldn't put down the fork. Even as she entered school on the rainy Friday morning, she was delivering a snickers bar bite-by-bite into her stomach. Like her mother, she, too had fallen victim to food addiction.

Hannah was at a loss. Her only hobby had been taken away from her and at the same time, her body and appetite had betrayed her. She didn't know what to do.
11233132212.title: Heavier Hannah

choices: Hanging out with Dani puts even more weight on Hannah's frame
Meanwhile, Paige is unknowingly gaining weight
Jackie and Maya try to think of more ways to fatten up Hannah
112331322121.content:
As Hannah walked back to the lunch table, holding her tray topped with two slices of pizza and a side of fries, Jackie and Maya sat there, smirking as they already had a pile of snacks waiting for Hannah.

"Dani, why didn't you bring any snacks today?" Jackie asked.

"I'm kinda starting to feel bad for her. I mean, she did nothing wrong to us, and we just fatten her up? I don't think she deserves that!" Dani answered, showing some sympathy for the new girl, being fat herself.

"Quiet, she's coming." Maya said as she saw Hannah coming in the distance next to Paige.

"Hey Hannah. Do you want to hang out after school today?" Dani asked as Hannah took her seat, causing her flabbier legs to jiggle a little.

"Sure sounds fun!" Hannah said. "Mall sound good?"

"Yea, that's perfect." Dani said.

"I would go but I have a date with Matt tonight. I can't believe our three year anniversary is in one month!" Paige excitedly said.

"Three years already? To think he proposed to you to homecoming with a box of pizza, shaped like a heart, and now you guys have been dating for three years?" Dani asked, as Paige chuckled.

"Yep, just like that." Paige laughed.

As the rest of the school day finished pretty quickly, Dani picked up Hannah at her house around 3:00 and they started their drive to the mall.

"So how are you liking Brookside so far?" Dani asked as her and Hannah walked next to each other, each with a mall pretzel in one hand and a large strawberry lemonade in the other.

"It's great, much better than I expected. Everyone has been so nice, especially you and Paige! I just feel like I'm getting a little plump lately." Hannah answered.

"You look just as thin as you did on the first day, and if anyone's fat here, it's me." Dani said with a laugh.

"Thanks, Dani. It means a lot. I just feel like some people are looking at me differently."

"Don't worry about it. Hey is that a new ice cream place?" Dani asked as her and Hannah walked over to get some ice cream.
112331322121.title: Plus Sized Pals

choices: Hannah's starting to enjoy it
Hannah's starting to hate it.
1123313221211.content:
Hannah had been heavy before, but a few more weeks of eating alongside Dani and soon her belly had significant overhang and her face was looking definetely plumper with a double chin. Her booty strained against her jeans and her breasts began to distort their top.

It seemed like seemingly all day she would pig out on pizzas, sodas, baked goods, candy, burgers, anything. Soon it even seemed like she was catching up Dani's weight. Some days she came home and lay in bed, feeling sick and awful and like a slob but before long the call of the food snatched up her mind again and she would go out tp yet another fast food place with Dani and Paige.

She didn't know how she felt about how her calorie consumption.
1123313221211.title: An even heftier Hannah

choices: They attempt to get her into cooking class
She's removed from gym class
1123313221213.content:
Jackie and Maya sit in the former's room, painting their nails with crossed legs.

"Well the plan's working, but I don't think it's working well enough." Maya said to her partner in subterfuge.

"Yeah, we gotta get her fatter faster. So we can get back to our boy-hunting." Jackie agreed.

"We could bribe Hill into kicking her off the team."

"Nah, she barely plays as it is. I mean, we're not bitches."

"What if we got her to remove her from gym?"

"Isn't it like a law that you have to do gym or something?"

"But you can still get a waiver."

"What if we convinced her to do cooking class?"

"That would work, too."

They both rubbed their chins as they thought.
1123313221213.title: Fattening Phase 2

choices: Hannah's putting on a lot of weight with the inclusion of cooking in her routine
Jackie's putting on a lot of weight with her new cooking class
Meanwhile, Paige's mom is noticing her daughters looking a little bigger
11233132212131.content:
It's been a week since Dani and Hannah started hanging out and Hannah had put on another five pounds, much to Jackie's pleasure, but Jackie thought that Hannah wasn't gaining fast enough, so she came up with an idea.

"Hey Hannah!" Jackie said as she walked up to her.

"Oh hey Jackie." Hannah said, eating a Hershey bar.

"I was thinking about transferring into a cooking class, and I was thinking we could take it together!"

"What about Maya?"

"She's not interested, same with Paige. I'm really surprised that Dani wasn't interested either." Jackie said with a laugh.

"Actually, cooking sounds pretty fun! I'll take the class with you!"

"Great, we can go down to the guidance counselor right now and finalize it!" Jackie said as her and Hannah walked down to the office.
11233132212131.title: Jackie Cooks Up An Idea

choices: Paige is fatter than Hannah
Paige is there to confront Hannah about her weight
112331322121311.content:
Hannah was loving every minute of cooking class. She loved everything she made, and made sure not to share her delectable treats with anyone else. A couple of weeks into her culinary adventure, she had gained a pound a day consistently, but her wardrobe hadn't adapted at all. She came into school on a Monday, dressed in a pair of skinny jeans that she failed to button, so she hid the unclasped waist with a stylish belt, giving her a muffin top to make any baker proud. Above that, she wore a white Nike t-shirt that exposed a sliver of belly fat, plus a sheer green cardigan, allowing a window into her developing back folds.

In her hand was a bag of McDonald's breakfast, which she was casually noshing on as she traversed the hallway in a slight waddle.

She came to her locker, where she found Paige...
112331322121311.title: Chef Cohen

choices: Paige comes home to her mother scolding her for her weight
Paige comes home to her mother, who's snacking on some chips, and looking bigger
Paige goes to the mall with Hannah
1123313221213111.content:
Hannah was very shocked to realize that Page was fatter than her. All this time, while Hannah was worried about her own weight, she'd failed to realize that her best friend was fattening up quickly in front of her the whole time. "Hey Hannah." Paige said, belching from her own Dunkin Donuts breakfast.

"Oh hey Paige." Hannah said as she took a bite of her hash brown. Hannah was shocked. Paige had to be around 170 by now.

"I was thinking after school, we could hang out at the mall and maybe buy some clothes." Paige said.

"Sounds fun." Hannah said as Paige waddled away. Her ass looked huge as it was barely controlled by a pair of stretchy black leggings. It shook and jiggled with each one of Paige's steps.
1123313221213111.title: Very Plump Paige

choices: Mrs. Daniels finally scolds Paige about her weight
Meanwhile, Jackie isn't looking so thin now either
Hannah's mother confronts her about her weight with an unexpected twist
1123313221213112.content:
"Look Hannah there's really something I have to tell you." Paige said, as she took a bite of her peanut butter chocolate protein bar for breakfast.

"What is it Paige?" Hannah belched as she stuffed a hash brown in her mouth.

"It's just that your getting kinda fat lately. I'm not trying to be mean, I just want to make sure everything's okay." Paige responded.

Hannah hadn't realized it but it was halfway through October and she'd already put on 30 pounds. "Yea everything's fine." Hannah replied. "In fact, I'm feeling pretty happy. I'm getting great grades, especially in cooking. Coach is starting to play me a little more in volleyball. Life's good."

"Ok great. Just wanted to make sure." Paige said. Hannah didn't want to say anything but Paige wasn't looking so thin herself. Her stomach look bloated, her legs, arms and chest looked thicker, and a tiny double chin was starting to form. She looked about 135 pounds, maybe 140, but that was nowhere near Hannah's 160.
1123313221213112.title: Helping a Chubby Hand

choices: Hannah, Jackie, Paige and Dani hang out
Jackie continues to gain more weight from cooking
Hannah continues to fatten up
11233132212131122.content:
Meanwhile, while Jackie was busy fattening up Hannah, she wasn't realizing that the cooking class was fattening her up too. Ever since it started, she'd already gained 10 pounds, usually over-enjoying the tasty treats her and Hannah baked together.

"Ugh I'm stuffed." Jackie said as she chatted with Hannah after one class.

"Well that's because you ate most of the double fried Oreo's!" Hannah chuckled.

"I'm pretty sure Mrs.Ross yelled at me for using too much sugar even though judging by her body that's probably what she did as a student too." Jackie replied as her and Hannah started laughing. Originally viewing her as an enemy, Jackie was starting to view Hannah as a friend.

Meanwhile, Maya was starting to see Jackie talking to Hannah a lot, and she was starting to get jealous.

"Jackie, don't you think you're spending too much time with Hannah?" Maya asked as her and Jackie walked with their lunch trays back to the table.

"No, and you should try to get to know her she's really nice." Jackie replied.

"Did you forget about your original goal?"

"No, obviously the guys are going to like me. Hannah's a fatty now." Jackie said as her and Maya laughed.
11233132212131122.title: Chef Mills

choices: math
history
science
113.content: Paige decided to go to McDonald's for lunch. When she gets there, she had trouble deciding what to order. She looks up at the menu and finally came to a decision. Paige decided to order a Big Mac with medium fries and a chocolate shake. She sat down to eat her meal when Dani came back with a double cheeseburger, large fries and ten piece McNuggets, an absolutely ginormous meal. After school finished, she decided to hang out at the mall with her friends. After clothes shopping, they stopped at the food court and Paige ordered a pretzel and a cup of cherry cola. After that she decided it was getting late and headed home. Weirdly, late at night, around 11 pm, she has a craving for something sweet so she started eating a box of chocolate she had in the refrigerator. Eight pieces later, she put the box away and headed upstairs to video chat friends before falling asleep. Paige woke up the next morning and started her day with a breakfast of microwaved pancakes. Afterwards, she went to school and after some boring periods, Paige headed to...
113.title: A Food Filled Day

choices: Paige eats even more at lunch
Paige goes to cheerleading practice after school with Mrs. Prior
Paige and Dani hang out that night
1132.content:
As Paige walked into class with her friend Julianna, she noticed an obese substitute in front of the class, which she felt was weird because it was only the second day of school and it was odd for a person like Mr. Green to be absent.

"Hello class." The substitute said as the class settled into their seats. "I'm Mrs.Diamond. Mr. Green was very sick today and couldn't come to school, obviously." She continued as the sound of something being knocked down was heard.

"Her ass is so big." Paige whispered to Julianna as they both started laughing. Mrs. Diamond knocked down a flower vase with her behind.

"Oops my bad." She said as her face turned red. "Now, he decided it was best if we just watched a movie, so I brought in Ferris Bueller's Day Off and some popcorn for everyone." The class cheered as Mrs. Diamond turned on the movie and gave everybody a sizable portion of popcorn. Paige especially pigged out, asking for seconds as she continuously stuffed the popcorn in her mouth.

"Looks like she has a big appetite." Mrs. Diamond thought to herself as Paige raised her hand for thirds, as Julianna did the same.
1132.title: Sizable Substitute

choices: Leave School and go home
Go to McDonald's
11321.content:
After watching the movie and eating a few portions of popcorn, you would think Paige would have a healthy lunch. That would not be the case, Grabbing a tray of p zza and a couple cookies, she sat down with Dani, who noticed the larger portion. "Geez, Paige, did you not have enough popcorn during class?," she said, eyeing Paige's meal. Paige took a cookie and started to eat. "Mmm, this is good, I wish I hopen I don't gain too much weight." Paige said as she continued to eat.

As the rest of the day continued, Paige was feeling hungrier, and couldn't wait until she got home to eat more. Paige felt relieved when the final bell rang, and after saying bye to her friends, walked to her white BMW as she heard her stomach rumble. "I'm starved." Paige said to herself.
11321.title: Paige eats even more at lunch

choices: Paige's mom scolds her for eating fast food
Falls asleep
113211.content:
Climbing into her white BMW, her belly rumbled, which prompted Paige to say, "I'm starved," and she drove home, placing her phone on her belly and putting it on vibrate, so she could feel satisfied while driving. Seeing a burger place on her drive home, she pulled into the drive-thru, and ordered a double decker cheeseburger and a milkshake, hoping that would hold her over until she got home. She drove to the window and paid for the food, hoping it would satisfy her rumbling belly until she got home. "Thank you, miss, come again." She parked in a spot and ate the burger, getting some of it on her sweats. Burping as she drove away, her phone vibrated and she lifted it up, "Hmm, I got a text from Dani." She responds to the text and drives home.

"Mom, I'm home!"
113211.title: Leave School and go home

choices: Paige continues to have a big appetite
Paige dreamt that she her mother was fat instead of a health nut
1132111.content:
"He Paige!" Liz said before stopping when Paige walked into the kitchen. "Is that fast food I smell?" Liz asked. Paige guiltily nodded. "Paige Ixalready made you dinner." Liz said as Paige states at the disgusting looking grilled chicken meal her mother prepared.

"Sorry mom. I was just really hungry today for some reason." Paige responded as her mother took a bite of the chicken. "Do you still want your dinner?" Liz asked as Paige's stomach begged her to say yes. "Sure." Paige said as she sat at the table. "So how was school?" Liz asked while Paige ate a huge bite of the chicken. "Just the usual." Paige said as she let out a burp.
1132111.title: Liz the Health Nut

choices: Amanda, her sister in college
Elizabeth, her mother obsessed with being healthy
Her thin Aunt Amy, who's a health freak
Maybe one of her cousins?
There is also the option for Aunt Sarah, who is already 320 pounds
12.content:
Here's where you choose which member of Paige's family you would like to fatten up.

There are many options, but which will you choose?
12.title: The Daniels Family Tree

choices: Liz can't stop, she's become addicted to eating
Paige "accidently" throws away Liz's workout tapes
Dad wants to help fatten up Liz too
122.content:
"Paige! I told you to only eat the fat free ice cream! Not the regular chocolate ice cream!" Liz screamed as as saw her daughter at the kitchen table having a bowl of ice cream.

"Mom when will you realize that I don't have to eat healthy food all the time?! I'm going to be 18 soon, I don't need you yelling at me about what I eat!" Paige angrily replied as she stormed up to her room with the bowl of ice cream. It was safe to say Liz was stressed, and the only thing Liz did when she was stress was eat. She grabbed the ice cream carton since it was the closest food in sight and started stuffing her face.

It was safe to say that Paige had finally had enough of her mother's overzealous parenting. All the years of her berating Paige for eating unhealthy have finally over annoyed Paige. Paige tried to come up with an idea on how to fatten up her mother. If she could make her mother fat, there would be no more over parenting, no more scolding for not eating healthy. Paige could finally eat what she wanted without being ridiculed.

The next day:
"Paige we literally had this conversation yesterday!" Liz said as she saw her daughter again eating the ice cream.

"But mom this is fat free!" Paige replied as she showed her mother the carton. "You can have the rest, I'm full." Paige said as she walked up to her room to text friends. Liz examined the carton. Fat free, low calorie, low sugar. Paige wasn't lying. It looked so good, and she felt starved. "I guess one bowl won't do any harm." Liz thought to herself.

Paige walked downstairs a few hours later to find most of the carton empty. She smiled as she realized that her mother had eaten what she thought was the low calorie ice cream, but was actually the high calorie ice cream, triple chocolate fudge brownie with high sugar. As Liz said good night to Paige, Paige realized a little tiny layer of flab on her mother's stomach, and smiled to herself.
122.title: A Healthy Tyrant

choices: Rachel and Fiona, the two obese twins
Ashley, the star soccer player
Lily, the slim softball player
124.content:
Paige has four cousins.
Two of which are obese(Rachel, Fiona) Both 15
And two of which are thin(Lily, Ashley) Ashley 16, Lily 17
Which will you choose?
124.title: Maybe one of her cousins?

Just Rachel
Just Fiona
1241.content: Here is where you choose if you would like to fatten up both, or just one of the cousins. After this, the story begins
1241.title: Rachel and Fiona, The Two Obese Twins

choices: Denny's
Buffet
Home
1242.content: Ashley kicked the ball past the sprawling goalkeeper, and the crowd went wild. Ashley just won the game for her team, the Bears, in a penalty shootout. Her team rushed the field and carried her off in tears. It took a while, but after pushing through all of the people congratulating her, she reached her mother, Amy's, car. "Hi honey, congratulations!" She hugged her daughter, and then asked her a question. "Let's go for a celebration dinner! Where do you want to go, honey?"
1242.title: Ashley, the star soccer player

choices: Ashley and Lily decide to apply for a job at Denny's
Amy's appetite convinced her to start eating more unhealthy
Ashley finds herself starting to become hungry more
12421.content:
"Alright fine, dear. But just this once! Tomorrow, you and Lily will have to run an extra ten minutes." Amy said as Ashley and her sister Lily frowned while walking to the car.

"Do you really have to be strict with their workouts?" Amy's husband and Ashley's father Jimmy asked.

"Yes or else they'll become fat, lazy slobs. Do you think I want our family to look like Sarah's?"

"Good point." Jimmy laughed as they started the drive.

The drive to Denny's from the school soccer field wasn't too long, maybe fifteen minutes. The family walked in, only to be greeted by an obese hostess. "Welcome to Denny's." She said, belching, and eating a cheeseburger. "We'll have a table for you, just follow me." The woman was clearly out of shape. Every waddle she made was followed by a loud and smelly fart, a wheeze or he sound of her thighs colliding together. "Here you go." She said, trying to catch her breath. "The waiter will be here soon with a complimentary basket of cheese bread." She continued, waddling away." Amy could still smell her wreak of fast food and sweat.

"Ugh, what a pig. I hate it here." Amy said displeased as she stared at the menu. "Now remember girls, only order from the 550 calories or less menu."

"Come on Amy. Give them a break, just for one night." Jimmy pleaded. Secretly, he hoped that his wife started to become fat too.

"Fine. As much as I hate to say this, I'll let you two order whatever you want. Just for tonight!" Amy made clear. Lily and Ashley high fived each other as the waiter came over, carrying the delicious cheese bread. The bread had a odoriferous scent, which made Ashley's stomach rumble. She quickly grabbed two pieces as Amy gave her a glare. After the waiter listed the specials, Ashley and Lily ordered a cheeseburger, Amy ordered a double cheeseburger because Jimmy convinced her.

While Lily and Ashley ate a lot, Amy was the true pig during dinner. "That was so good." Amy belched. As the family walked out, Ashley noticed a help wanted sign. "Lily, maybe you and me can work here, for extra money." "That's a good idea Ashley, but we can't tell mom, she'd be pissed." Little did they know, the Denny's would start a downwards health spiral that their mother could never recover from.
12421.title: The Daniels' Dinner at Denny's

info.brief_description: A story about Paige Daniels, a high school senior who you choose the path for getting fat.
info.description:
Hello Everyone, this is the story about the fictional world of Paige Daniels, a thin high school senior who goes to Brookside High School. You choose the path for gaining weight or staying thin. You could also fatten up other characters, such as her mother, sister, aunt, cousins or one of her friends, maybe even a teacher at her school! There are some rules:

Slob, such as burping, farting, sweating, wheezing, popping pants, not showering(smelling bad), and eating like a pig is allowed, perhaps requested
Max weight for a person is 500 pounds
No male weight gain
No magic
No vore
No sudden weight gain, for example, if someone gains 800 pounds at once
No animal weight gain(Paige's dog)
No sex

Other than that, I think it's all set up! Have fun writing! The character list is in my portfolio.
